summary: This document contains corporate resolutions authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts for a corporation. It outlines the powers granted to authorized signers and the responsibilities of the bank in relation to these accounts. The document emphasizes the authority of the signers and the indemnification of the bank against claims arising from their actions.
keyFacts: The document is a Certificate of Corporate Resolutions for a corporation authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage accounts.
It specifies the powers of Authorized Signers to open, maintain, and manage accounts.
The bank is indemnified against claims arising from actions taken by Authorized Signers.
The document states that no one other than the corporation has an interest in the accounts.
There is a provision for the delegation of powers by Authorized Signers to other agents.
